seo.title: Payment - Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing
seo.description: Proceed to payment of your tickets for the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. Make sure your cart is ready before continuing.
seo.confirmation_description: Your payment has been processed successfully. Thank you for purchasing your tickets for the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.

confirmation.see_mail: Your tickets have been sent by email. There is no need to print them; simply present the QR code on your mobile phone at the entrance. If you did not receive the tickets by email, please check your spam folder or download them from your customer account.

errors.not_authenticated: You must be logged in to proceed with payment.
errors.no_client_secret: Unable to process payment. Please try again later.
errors.no_card_element: The credit card field is missing or invalid. Please check your information.
errors.card_error: An error occurred with your card. Please check the details and try again.
errors.no_uuid: Missing payment information. Please try again.
errors.fetch_error: Error fetching payment information. Please try again.
